title: What is the concept of modified force and its impact on healing according to M. Dunvu.uî, and how does M. Th. Focachon create bleeding wounds on a hypnotized patient through suggestion?
first_phrase: In this text, M. Dunvu.uî explains his belief that a force circulates in human, animal, and plant bodies, as well as in nature itself. He believes that all of these forces are subject to the same laws and that the human body is polarized, with two individuals acting on each other like magnets. He argues that there is only one disease, and it is a disturbance of the balance of vital forces. The application of these principles, he claims, allows for the quick and easy treatment of diseases without the need for medical knowledge or medication. The article also mentions the work of M. Th. Focachon, who was able to create bleeding stigmata on a hypnotized subject.
